title: Transparent & Accessible
text: MarsSwap smart contracts are open-source, and its code will be verified on BSCScan. The original devs of the protocol have no power to take your funds or change the contracts.

section.title: Governance Based Migrations
section.content: MarsSwap protocol is governed by MARS token holders. Upgrades and changes to the protocol must be approved before they take effect, ensuring all changes are beneficial for the token holders.

section.title: Flash Loans
section.content: Arbitrage opportunities can be very profitable, but they require a large upfront investment. Flash loans obviate upfront capital requirements allowing anyone to profit.
